item.description:
Hey everyone! The prizes have been finalized!

1st Place: $150 Cash

2nd Place: 2 Tickets to Witches Woods & Dinner for 2 @ The Cheesecake Factory ($50 Gift Certificate)

3rd Place: Dinner for 2 @ Lir, Globe or McGann's

Share This Flyer!

Single and Ready to Mingle? Then come out to the Boston Singles Costume Party!

DO NOT DOUBLE RSVP! PLEASE RSVP IN ONE GROUP ONLY.

Our Boston Singles Party is hosted at Lir (near the Prudential Mall in Back Bay) at 903 Boylston Street in Boston MA, on Friday, October 27th from 7 to 10 pm. It doesn't end at 10, but it does open up to public.

We'll have the entire floor to ourselves, complete with our own bar, couches, music, tables and chairs. Appetizers are available and there won't be any refills so get there early!

We'll be having a costume contest too! We'll be awarding a first prize of $150, as well as second and third prizes, which will be announced here when confirmed!

When you arrive, walk over to the spiral staircase and ask for Matt, your gracious host. Please introduce yourself to me, tell me which Meetup group you're with, and pay with a $10 bill (only 10's please, no 1's, 5's or 20's). Everyone pays $10 cash.

❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤

Invited Meetup Groups are:

Boston Singles:
http://www.meetup.com/BostonSingles/

Social Fun

http://www.meetup.com/SocialFun/events/76666112/

Contact me (Matt Adams) if you run a Meetup group and would like to make this event available to your members.

❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤

I hope you all can join us for the Boston Singles Costume Party! This is going be a whole lot of fun again!

All the best,

~Matt

❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤

Parking for the Event:

Street parking is possible and generally easy to find around this time. Keep in mind the meters run until 8 pm.

Taking The T:

The closest stop in Hynes Convention Center on the B, C & D Green Lines, which is 2 blocks away.

There are parking garages around, but they are expensive.
item.how_to_find_us: We're downstairs. To the right after you walk in.
item.name: Boston Singles Costume Party! $400 in Prizes!
